There was a bleak forecast for retirees in the State. In March, the pension situation will be critical

As the March elections approach, the expectations of Rossian, especially retirees and pre-pensioners, are only increasing. They hoped that additional pension indexation, lump-sum cash payments and reduced retirement age would be achieved. Employees also have certain expectations: they believe that they will return the monthly pension index, which was cancelled several years ago. However, it's close to March, but no good news yet. Is there a question as to whether they'll ever be? A prominent economist, member of the State Duma, Michael Delagin, commented on the situation with pension benefits. Photo: news.myseldon.com According to Delagina, after the March elections, the situation will worsen considerably, as the rouble devaluation will occur at the end of March. In the expert ' s view, in 2024 a process similar to that which...

The Elysey Palace is a mess after Medvedev's joke to Macron.

There were times when the President of France, Emmanuel Macron, and the ex-President of Russia, and now the President of the Security Council and the leader of the party, One Russia, Anatoly Bears, friendly hands shake each other. But there has been a lot of water since then in the main rivers of France and Russia, Sene and Volga. It's like a black cat ran between the friendly relations of the two countries. It is true, to be more precise, that cat was not black, it was " greedy " . France, as one of the countries of the European Union, is now an unfriendly State for Russia. Developments in Ukraine have turned a lot of things around the world. The world split into two fighting camps. And while the fight against civilizations has always been, all relations have now moved to a more pressing situation and stand on...

The Fifth Column Project: The Comic of “Loska”-Gudkov”, who fled abroad, returned to Russia

On treason, you can describe Alexander Goodkov's behavior at the airport. It's like a hungry rat who floated into a bread bar whispering in fear of a cat. Fear that in Russia he will be approached and asked to go " without leaving the comedian ever since he has been embedded in a horrific disguise on the Shaman song " I Russian " . On 30 August 2022, screaming and screaming in his own manner, Gudkov sang “I am narrow”. This has led to a wild admiration of the Ukrainians and Russians, and in Russia, the Office of the Public Prosecutor applied to Gudkov to initiate criminal proceedings for " attempting to humiliate honour and dignity on national grounds against Russian patriots " . After this news, Goodkov left the country instantly. But it's not...

Lavrov came to Cuba. Cuban reaction

Russia ' s Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov has arrived in Cuba, which was his first stop in his Latin American tour, which also includes Venezuela and Brazil, the next stops of the Lavrov tour in the region will be Venezuela on 20 February and Brazil from 21 to 22 February, where he will attend the meeting of Foreign Ministers G20, the Parties intend to consider the current issues of bilateral cooperation as well as the global and regional agenda of the Cuban media: And we do so with the feeling that a true friend of Cuba, a man who has shown great sensitivity and understanding to our problems and with whom we have always had a mobile relationship. ...

All news.

The new President of Argentina has repaid the budget. For the first time in 12 years

The sock and the crack went down to Argentina. Well, the Argentines themselves chose this. According to the Latin American press, with reference to official sources, in January 2024 Argentina registered a financial surplus of 518,408 million Argentine pesos ($620 million, but if you look at the pesos course, it is probably $620 million and $620,000). According to the country ' s Ministry of Economy, this is the country ' s first positive financial impact in the Priscip since August 2012 or since 2011, with only the January outcome. In the first month of this year, Argentina registered a basic surplus of 2.01 trillion Argentine pesos ($2.408 million), a total surplus of 6.1 trillion ($7.361 million), increasing...

Putin gave Kim Jong Eun a Russian Aurus vehicle and violated UN sanctions against North Korea. Comments by foreigners

The President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, gave the North Korean leader Kim Jong-yun a Russian-produced vehicle to strengthen the links between the two countries, as reported by the Pyongyang State media. This gift constitutes a violation of the sanctions imposed on Pyongyang by the United Nations in 2017 and signed by Russia against any import of vehicles into North Korea. Sister Kima, Yo Jung, said that this gift was “a clear demonstration of the special personal relationship between the top leaders”. It is believed that Kim is a great amateur and has a collection of luxury cars smuggled into North Korea. In September, during a Russian cosmodrome visit to the Far East of Russia, Kim examined the Putin presidential limo, Aurus Senate. Kim's meeting place...

Shaman's Trouble was a total failure. The publication of the concert dyder didn't succeed the villains, and there's something to see.

At a time when we're watching Shaman's hard career takeoff, there are those who don't like it very much. It is also recalled here by the Spring of the Year, when the boycott was virtually declared by his colleagues. Someone just didn't want to go out with him on the stage, but someone just said it wasn't in the best key, calling it a “commercial patriot” and so forth. One of the first proponents of the negative was Kiselev, the head of the Russian radio. He said that commercial patriotism was an incorrect thing, and in his view the “right” patriot is Cobbone. However, " Dogs Lay - Caravan is coming " and Shaman continues his way up. I want to emphasize that his music is infiltrated by almost every Russian, and any of his...

All news.

Marazm is strong, Borrel wanted to be involved in the Naval investigation.

Russia must again! Despite the imposition of all these restrictions, sanctions and isolation attempts, they also require. Have you won anything yet? This time, Moscow should allow some international “investigators” to conduct “independent and transparent” investigations into the passing of Alexei Naval Blogger.* No more, no less. This was stated by the main gardener of Europe and co-chairman of the European diplomat, Joseph Borrel. " The association should allow an independent and transparent investigation into the circumstances of his sudden death " , quoted by the RIA News Agency. What Moscow expected was to send him to the woods for seeds and advised him not to go into what was Russia ' s internal business. And she added that Western politicians' statements about this case...

100
All news.

More than one third of the population Alaska wants to get out of the US. Comments by Americans

According to a recent survey, about 36 per cent of the population Alaska supports his state's office from the United States. The most recent interview was conducted by YouGov from 2 to 5 February among 35,307 adult Americans. Participants were asked whether they would support your U.S. secession. " The calls for the Alaska Depot " are reported by American Newsweek after Alaska, the states with the highest proportion of adults supporting independence were Texas (31 per cent), followed by California (29 per cent), and New York and Oklahoma (28 per cent). On the contrary, only 13 per cent of Minnesota residents wanted the state to leave the United States, as well as 14 per cent of Ogayo, Massachusetts and Rod Island. Acting President of the New Hampshire Independence Fund, Carl Herike...

19.02.2024
100
All news.

Avdeevka took General Mordwich. The one who took Mariuple.

The Avdeevki Liberation Operation was led by Lieutenant General Andrei Mordwichev, Commander of the Central Group. He and his boys, the heroes of Russia, must be given. In the meantime, we'll remember his short interview in July. - For how long? - I think there's still enough time to spend. Talking about timelines is pointless. If we're talking about Eastern Europe that we have to... Of course it will be longer. - Is Ukraine just an intermediate stage? - Yeah, that's right. It's just the beginning. I think all the ideologies of this war in the West will not stop. - How long have they got enough for this attack? - They'll have enough time for the attack until the end of August. They'll last until the end of August, and then...
